original_title: Colombo Dockyard reports 332.1 million rupee profit in Dec-2022
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Colombo Dockyard Plc, a Sri Lankan shipbuilding unit of Japan’s Onomichi Dockyard, reported a 332.1 million rupee profit for the December 2022 quarter, down from a 340.5 million rupee profit a year earlier.
For the 12 months ended December, Colombo Dockyard earned 9.96 rupees a share.

Revenue for the December quarter grew 49.2 percent to 8.4 billion rupees, while cost of sales increased by 56.71 percent to 7.7 billion rupees, leading to gross profits falling 7.27 percent to 612.9 million rupees.
Revenue on shipbuilding, repairing and heavy engineering segments grew during 2022.
Other income for the December quarter amounted to 1.7 billion rupees, up from a 129.3 million rupees a year earlier.
Net finance expenses grew 283.77 percent for the quarter to 543.5 million rupees.
Short-term borrowings grew to 26.6 billion rupees from 11.02 billion rupees a year earlier. (Colombo/Mar09/2022)
